entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is participating in a flying competition.

entities.name: horntail
entities.description: A dragon that is part of the flying competition, and is being ridden by Harry.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: A person who is commentating on the flying competition.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: A person who is being addressed by Bagman, and is likely a competitor in the flying competition.

entities.name: eggs
entities.description: A group of eggs that Harry spots while he is flying.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: An object that is being compared to the Horntail's fire by Harry.

relationships.description: The Horntail is following Harry as he flies.
Bagman is addressing Mr. Krum, likely to get his attention.
